website_summaries.verdict: This oversized, sand-free microfiber towel doubles as a beach blanket. Just be sure to wash it alone a few times.
pros: includes pockets for weighting if used as a blanket
Buyer gets a choice of colors
cons: The color may bleed a bit at first
Owners should wash it by itself a few times

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This beach blanket is fantastic!! Love the soft feel. It's not the usual microfiber you'd expect, because I usually don't like the feel of most microfiber towels. This one is like butter. It's also thin enough to go in my beach bag along with a similar towel with plenty of room for anything else I need. It has pockets so you can put things in it to weight it down - we used our flip flops. I've talked about this blanket for 3 days now and everyone is tired of hearing how wonderful it is!! I could do a commercial on it - that's how much I love it! Oh and the colors are so vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Amsch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: It's large and perfect for travel. I thought it'd be a little lighter but it still works to throw into a backpack for a day on the sand. My husband is 6'2" and I'm 5'7" and we both fit on this blanket well. I love the corner sand pockets that weigh it down flat! Because this blanket is so large we also used it to cover our stuff in the back of our rental car like my very large bicycle box. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debeck

customer_reviews.title: This blanket would be amazing if it didn't DYE everything I washed with it
customer_reviews.text: This blanket would be amazing if it didn't DYE everything I washed with it.... after at least 10 times being washed by itself, I thought it was safe. Completely ruined my daughters and my bathing suits!
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Beach day essential!
customer_reviews.text: Great big blanket and it held up to its claims. Great at absorbing water and easy to dust sand off of. Of course the sand stuck to the bottom of parts that got wet but a good shake and it all came off. I like the little corner pockets to fill with sand to keep the towel in place. It’s also a great size and fits multiple people easily! It does bleed in color though when I washed it so wash alone or with like colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I went to a beach with powder-like sand and I loved that the material would just wick it off with ...
customer_reviews.text: Beach day today! I would do 4.5, it was almost at 5 stars but the wind picked up and the long sides kept folding in which got sand on the blanket. I went to a beach with powder-like sand and I loved that the material would just wick it off with a decent gust. The pockets of sand were effective anchors; everything stayed in place for the most part. I got a couple stares when I was dumping the pockets-- at least I think it was intrigue. ...my master plan, buy a couple hundred of these and make the largest beach blanket ever (...not really but have at it )
customer_reviews.author: F. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected and great summer colors!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as expected. I've used it several times this beach season and it's the perfect size for two people. I really like the pockets that you can tuck rocks in or something else to keep it in place. It's absorbent enough and dries pretty quickly. It's absorbent too and the colors are nice! It washes and dries well in the machine. I've got several compliments at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beach blanket. I wish it was a few inches longer, but otherwise perfect. Very lightweight, fits two medium sized people, takes up minimal space packing up, soft fabric, works as a towel, drys quickly, colors held up in the wash, easy to fill corners with a handful of sand so it does not blow away. What more could you ask for? If you want a beach blanket for two people (or a lot of space for yourself) that fits into a backpack or larger purse, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: ToddinDC

customer_reviews.title: Good beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this towel for a beach trip we had. It was perfect. I loved the pockets that held sand to keep it down. It was big enough for both my husband and I to use. It doesn't "repel" sand. With 2 kids I was constantly getting sand on it. However it didn't "hold onto" sand like some of my other blankets did. Once I left the beach it was easy to shake the sand off so I didn't take it home with me!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Pink polka dots! So pretty and BIG. Large beach blanket!

I can’t wait to take it out to the beach... therefore I cannot comment on the effectiveness of the microfiber/sand yet but it’s very pretty and feels nice. Would do nicely for a picnic somewhere as well.
customer_reviews.author: your friend

customer_reviews.title: It soaks up water FAST!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. I'm going to get one for my brother and sister in law since they go to the beach a lot. I don't go to the beach. But I have long hair. I like these microfiber towels because they dry my hair so quickly so I don't have to spend so much time blow-drying my hair. This wraps MANY TIMES around my head, so there's a lot of material to soak up the water. I leave it on for an hour and finish my nightly toilette and/or read or surf, and by the time I unwind it, my hair is merely damp. I require almost no time to blow-dry my hair.

It took three people to get it flat and HEAVY rocks (over five pounds) in each corner to keep it weighted. My dog walked on it with wet feet and trampled sand on it. It never dried out and we had sand on it all day. I had better luck the next day with my $10 nylon sleeping bag from Wal-Mart.
